text: Majhe Pati Saubhagyavati is an Indian Marathi language 2015 soap opera. == Plot == It is the story of Vaibhav Malwankar. Vaibhav and his wife Laxmi came to Mumbai around 14 years ago. He dreams of becoming a successful actor, but after too many rejections, he has reached a stage where it has become a crumble. He has one last chance to give a good life for his wife and himself. The role he will perform is a lady character who gives them his career and helps him change his life completely. == Cast == * Vaibhav Mangle as Vaibhav Malwankar / Lakshmi * Nandita Dhuri as Laxmi Vaibhav Malwankar * Ashok Shinde as P. K. * Ramesh Bhatkar as Makarand Bhandari * Aarti Vadagbalkar as Surekha; Vaibhav's hairstylist * Uday Sabnis as Laxmi's father * Adwait Dadarkar as Director of Vaibhav's serial * Samir Paranjape as Sandy; Laxmi's brother * Sandip Pathak as Surekha's husband * Sneha Majgaonkar as Manisha * Ruchira Jadhav * Uma Sardeshmukh * Surbhi Bhave-Damle == Ratings == It started on 28 September 2015. Week Year BARC Viewership Ref.
